resources.string: Texte supplémentaire expliquant pourquoi nous avons besoin de cette autorisation
Ouvrir les paramètres BT par défaut
Zipper les applications FYT dans AllAppUpdate.bin
Ce n\'est pas une unité FYT. L\'application sera fermée.
This app is only for FYTs on real Android 10 with SDK version 29. The app will be closed.
You will now find 4 files on your usb-stick inside the folder BACKUP:
If you copy these 4 files with a 6315_1.zip to a clean USB-disk, you can always restore your uis7862 (ums512) unit.
If you copy these 4 files with a 6316_1.zip to a clean USB-disk, you can always restore your uis8581 (sc9863) unit.
Set Device to Day or Night mode
In a few seconds you will see below displayed popup and your script will start.
You need to reboot your unit now to activate the change.
Buttons with \"the android with root on its chest\" require root access.
Pincode works, but physical\nhomekey overrules lockscreen,\nso currently useless.
This is a partly incompatible Teyes unit.
This is a Teyes unit with \"ro.build.fytmanufacturer = 95\". The partition/flashing scheme is different. No backup possible.
Starting to collect system info.\nPlease be patient.
Check Internal Storage for zip file HWGetInfo.zip and folder HWGetInfo containing the collected system info.
file config.txt does not exist or could not find file in folder /oem/app.
In a few seconds you will see the popup with Start/Cancel for a \"firmware upgrade\". This is necessary to apply the changes.
Add default BT settings to FYT Settings.
Add default BT settings to FYT Settings.
This will add the default Bluetooth settings screen, that you are never able to access directly, into the FYT Settings apk.
The default Bluetooth settings are already added into the FYT Settings apk.
